# metalite.sl

## Overview

R package designed for the analysis & reporting of subject baseline
characteristics in clinical trials. We assume ADaM datasets are ready
for analysis and leverage [metalite](https://merck.github.io/metalite/)
data structure to define inputs and outputs.

## Workflow

The general workflow is:

1.  Define metadata information using metalite.
2.  [`prepare_sl_summary()`](https://merck.github.io/metalite.sl/reference/prepare_sl_summary.md)
    prepares datasets for summary of baseline characteristics.
3.  [`format_base_char()`](https://merck.github.io/metalite.sl/reference/format_base_char.md)
    formats output layout.
4.  [`rtf_base_char()`](https://merck.github.io/metalite.sl/reference/rtf_base_char.md)
    creates TLFs.

Here is a quick example

``` r
library("metalite.sl")

meta_sl_example() |>
  prepare_sl_summary(
    population = "apat",
    observation = "apat",
    parameter = "age;gender"
  ) |>
  format_base_char() |>
  rtf_base_char(
    source = "Source: [CDISCpilot: adam-adsl]",
    path_outdata = tempfile(fileext = ".Rdata"),
    path_outtable = tempfile(fileext = ".rtf")
  )
```

## Highlighted features

- Avoid duplicated input by using metadata structure.
  - For example, define analysis population once to use in all adverse
    events analysis.
- Consistent input and output in standard functions.
- Streamlines mock table generation.

# Package index

## Subject-level analysis

- [`meta_sl()`](https://merck.github.io/metalite.sl/reference/meta_sl.md)
  : Create metadata for subject-level analysis table
- [`prepare_sl_summary()`](https://merck.github.io/metalite.sl/reference/prepare_sl_summary.md)
  : Prepare data for baseline characteristic table
- [`format_sl_summary()`](https://merck.github.io/metalite.sl/reference/format_sl_summary.md)
  : Prepare data for baseline characteristic table
- [`rtf_sl_summary()`](https://merck.github.io/metalite.sl/reference/rtf_sl_summary.md)
  : Baseline characteristic table

## Baseline characteristics

- [`prepare_base_char()`](https://merck.github.io/metalite.sl/reference/prepare_base_char.md)
  : Prepare data for baseline characteristic table
- [`format_base_char()`](https://merck.github.io/metalite.sl/reference/format_base_char.md)
  : Format Baseline Characteristics Analysis
- [`rtf_base_char()`](https://merck.github.io/metalite.sl/reference/rtf_base_char.md)
  : Baseline characteristic table
- [`react_base_char()`](https://merck.github.io/metalite.sl/reference/react_base_char.md)
  : Display interactive baseline characteristic tables with AE subgroup
  analysis
- [`prepare_base_char_subgroup()`](https://merck.github.io/metalite.sl/reference/prepare_base_char_subgroup.md)
  : Prepare data for treatment compliance table
- [`format_base_char_subgroup()`](https://merck.github.io/metalite.sl/reference/format_base_char_subgroup.md)
  : Prepare data for Subgroup Analysis for Baseline Characteristic
- [`rtf_base_char_subgroup()`](https://merck.github.io/metalite.sl/reference/rtf_base_char_subgroup.md)
  : Subgroup Analysis for Baseline Characteristic

## Disposition

- [`prepare_disposition()`](https://merck.github.io/metalite.sl/reference/prepare_disposition.md)
  : Prepare data for treatment compliance table
- [`format_disposition()`](https://merck.github.io/metalite.sl/reference/format_disposition.md)
  : Format Disposition Analysis
- [`rtf_disposition()`](https://merck.github.io/metalite.sl/reference/rtf_disposition.md)
  : Disposition table
- [`react_disposition()`](https://merck.github.io/metalite.sl/reference/react_disposition.md)
  : Display interactive disposition tables with AE subgroup analysis

## Exposure duration

- [`prepare_exp_duration()`](https://merck.github.io/metalite.sl/reference/prepare_exp_duration.md)
  : Prepare data for exposure duration table
- [`extend_exp_duration()`](https://merck.github.io/metalite.sl/reference/extend_exp_duration.md)
  : Add cumulative count and summary stats for categories for exposure
  duration analysis
- [`format_exp_duration()`](https://merck.github.io/metalite.sl/reference/format_exp_duration.md)
  : Format Exposure Duration Analysis
- [`rtf_exp_duration()`](https://merck.github.io/metalite.sl/reference/rtf_exp_duration.md)
  : Exposure duration table
- [`plotly_exp_duration()`](https://merck.github.io/metalite.sl/reference/plotly_exp_duration.md)
  : Create an interactive plot for exposure duration

## Treatment compliance

- [`prepare_trt_compliance()`](https://merck.github.io/metalite.sl/reference/prepare_trt_compliance.md)
  : Prepare data for treatment compliance table
- [`format_trt_compliance()`](https://merck.github.io/metalite.sl/reference/format_trt_compliance.md)
  : Format Treatment Compliance Analysis
- [`rtf_trt_compliance()`](https://merck.github.io/metalite.sl/reference/rtf_trt_compliance.md)
  : Treatment compliance table

## Collect components

- [`collect_baseline()`](https://merck.github.io/metalite.sl/reference/collect_baseline.md)
  : Count number of subjects

## Example data

- [`meta_sl_example()`](https://merck.github.io/metalite.sl/reference/meta_sl_example.md)
  :

  Create an example `meta_sl_example` object

- [`meta_sl_exposure_example()`](https://merck.github.io/metalite.sl/reference/meta_sl_exposure_example.md)
  :

  Create an example `meta_sl_exposure_example` object

## Deformat

- [`defmt_pct()`](https://merck.github.io/metalite.sl/reference/defmt_pct.md)
  : Deformat percent

## Example data

- [`metalite_sl_adsl`](https://merck.github.io/metalite.sl/reference/metalite_sl_adsl.md)
  : A subject level demographic dataset
- [`metalite_sl_adae`](https://merck.github.io/metalite.sl/reference/metalite_sl_adae.md)
  : An adverse event dataset

  histogram](https://merck.github.io/metalite.sl/articles/exposure-duration-histogram.md):
